title: Beyond the Gloesmur
description: A stable boy and a flying horse pursue a mysterious quest with a beautiful but pampered princess from a faraway land. Read along as Princess Jondalyn journeys beyond the Gloesmur for an enchanting "once upon a time" tale of adventure. Beautifully illustrated with pen and ink drawings by the author, this juvenile fantasy makes a wonderful read aloud book for the whole family. The reading level is upper elementary to adult. It is a high interest level book that is well received by reluctant readers.
author: Kathleen E. Deisher
